headline: After a 29% Slide YTD, Is UnitedHealth Stock Poised for a Rebound?
summary: While UnitedHealth's scale remains unmatched, scale alone is not enough. Its future rests on restoring profitability.

headline: UnitedHealth Is Cutting Medicare Advantage Plans. Here Is Where UNH Stock Could Be Headed Next.
summary: UnitedHealth stock is in focus as the company announces plans of scaling back Medicare Advantage offerings. Here’s where the options data suggests UNH shares are headed next.

headline: Should You Sell Your Holdings in UnitedHealth Group (UNH)?
summary: ClearBridge Investments, an investment management company, released its “ClearBridge Large Cap Growth Strategy” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equities continued their upward journey in the third quarter with the S&P 500 Index surging 8.1% and tech-heavy Nasdaq Composite rising 11.2% to record highs. Investor optimism was driven […]

headline: Shareholder group calls on UnitedHealth to decouple CEO from board chair
summary: Stephen Hemsley is the chairman of UnitedHealth’s board and its CEO. The Accountability Board says that undercuts corporate governance at a turbulent time for the company.
